title: Boku No Hero Academia -  Kiss Made Tooi Manga (Doujinshi)
alternative_title: Kisu Made Tooi Manga (Boku no Hero Academia) ; Boku no Hero Academia dj - Kiss made Toui Manga ; The Breadth Before a Kiss (Boku no Hero Academia)
status: Kisu Made Tooi Manga (Boku no Hero Academia) ; Boku no Hero Academia dj - Kiss made Toui Manga ; The Breadth Before a Kiss (Boku no Hero Academia)
description:
Description :
        This is the story of the ordeals that two inexperienced, young lovers must go through to achieve their First Kiss. It is a BNHA dj with the pairing Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto.
